title: BACK TO SCHOOL: WIN THE MORNING, WIN THE DAY
itunes:title: BACK TO SCHOOL: WIN THE MORNING, WIN THE DAY
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
MAKE THIS SCHOOL YEAR YOUR BEST ONE YET! As back to school rolls out around the world, we're revisiting some of our most motivational speeches to get you motivated for the upcoming year.


WIN THE MORNING AND YOU WILL WIN THE DAY! Listen to this in the morning to start your day right!


Speaker


Coach Pain


"I am honored to share my story with you so that you can see the path that brought me to where I am today. You see, I believe that it is through difficult situations and great pain that the human spirit grows and character is developed. And my story is a testament to this.

I started in the fitness industry when I was only 18 years old, and I knew that it was where I belonged. I had always been into fitness and enjoyed being active through my whole childhood. I was involved in Martial Arts, Wrestling and Football throughout high school and was generally a very physical person. I have been in the field for 26+ years and plan to stay here for many more. While I always enjoyed my work and was successful with it, I was not as passionate then as I am now. The passion didn’t come until much later. The passion came through the most painful loss I have ever experienced…" – Coach Pain


YouTube: http://bit.ly/2LmRyea

Instagram: http://bit.ly/2XLcLW5

Website: http://bit.ly/2YTgWvq

Book Coach Pain: http://bit.ly/2JMefFu

Music:


Really Slow Motion
